title: Emotion-Based Mobile Microlearning Design: Language Learning Optimization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning and multimedia tool utilization experience
context.additional_context: Short-Intensive Program Focused on Language Proficiency Improvement in a Mobile Learning Environment Utilizing Personal Devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can maintain positive emotions through multimedia materials applying affective design principles and improve language comprehension by over 20%.
Learners can explain the impact of emotion-evoking design elements—identified through formative assessments—on reducing cognitive load.
Learners can improve the accuracy of language transfer task performance by over 15% using mobile-optimized materials designed to induce positive emotions.

resources: Microcontent Creation Tool for Language Learning

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
